name: Magister Umbero Zastro

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
text: Umbero has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put him to sleep.

action.name: Rapier
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
text: The noble adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the noble must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

description:
A handsome, eloquent, and fair-minded half-elf in his thirties. He's known for his finely honed sense of poetic justice and for meting out unconventional punishments.
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 82
